oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis, two-dimensional (HNMR)-H-1 spectrum, and DNA binding studies of 2,2 '-bipyrudine-2-pyridinecarboxylato-platinum (II) nitrate
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANSURI-TORSHIZI, H
SHAD, MHA
SRIVASTAVA, TS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: platinum complexes
antitumor
acids
platinum complex
2-pyridinecarboxylate
dna-binding studies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A complex of formula [Pt (a-n) (bpy)] NO3 (where a-n is 2 - pyridinecarboxylate anion and bpy is 2,2'-bipyridine) was prepared, its structure was established by 2D COSY spectral method; and it binds to calf thymus DNA nonintercalative noncovalent mode of binding.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IRANIAN JOURNAL OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY, 25(A1), 153-156
